title: HELP! I can't see my sign in screen!
body: I double click my league of legends shortcut on my desktop, and I COULD see the free to play champions, patch notes, etc. But the problem is when I click "LAUNCH". The window just disappears, and I don't see the MSI log-in screen with the dragon on it. Anyone have a fix?

replies.body:
Definitely possible that there is an issue with the patcher itself where it isn't properly telling the Login Screen to appear.  In order to get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434).  The steps there should get this resolved and get you into the client once more!

Give me a heads up if you are still seeing any issues!
I've tried all of the methods on the Patching Issues page you linked me. None of the methods have worked for me.

Given that these steps haven't worked, it is possible that this may be some sort of OS Permissions issue.  Essentially the patcher is trying to force itself to open, but the OS is blocking it from doing so.  To that end, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104).  Some of the steps may seem fairly simple, but it will allow us to rule this out as a possible root cause.

> [{quoted}](name=xEnderPigx,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9d0kTFbF,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-12T02:06:50.895+0000)
>
> I've tried all of the methods on the Patching Issues page you linked me. None of the methods have worked for me.

This might be related to a connection issue. Can you ensure that League of Legends is added as an exception to any antivirus applications and firewalls that you may have running?

Otherwise, give the solutions in this thread a shot:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues
address this globally on the boards. I can't even get the client to work for me. So I advise you address it.
